title: In LR, AD increases cause PL increases

content.question: Assume a countryâ€™s economy is currently in long-run equilibrium. What is the long-run effect of an increase in aggregate demand?

choices.label: A decrease in the unemployment rate
A decrease in the inflation rate
A decrease in the long-run aggregate supply
An increase in the price level
An increase in the money supply

content.answer: An increase in the price level

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
